metadata.title: CVE-2022-27378 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the component Create_tmp_table::finalize of MariaDB Serverv10.7 and below was discovered to allow attackers to cause a Denial ofService (DoS) via specially crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
